title: What is this rounded type ?
content:
it’s got some texturing on it , but i care just about the original typeface , do you know wich one it is and if there is a free/open or an alternative to it ?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [areyoudead.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010040/http:/typophile.com/files/areyoudead.jpg) | 15.8 KB |

 [‹ Interesting numbers on Sheffield watch](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010040/http:/typophile.com/node/49870 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Round C ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010040/http:/typophile.com/node/49869 "Go to next forum topic")
author: TweakingKnobs

comments.content:
Im pretty sure its just Frankfurter with an offest path or a thick stroke.

[http://www.linotype.com/462/frankfurter-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010040/http:/www.linotype.com/462/frankfurter-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/462/frankfurter-family.html")

I gave it a shot there, looks pretty close.

[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v328/bobbykills/Picture8.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010040/http:/img.photobucket.com/albums/v328/bobbykills/Picture8.png "http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v328/bobbykills/Picture8.png")
i would back that up too, im pretty sure its frankfurter (like dunking donuts use for their logotype!) set to outlines with a slightly thicker stroke line

thanx ,

@ bobby : wich frankfurter u used ? meduim , normal etc... ? and how you did the path or stroke ? in photoshop , illustrator ?

thanx.

Anyway , can im looking for a cool font rounded font so i found a couple of them , can you identify these 2 ?

this one is nice, but is diferent from the one that ive been told is frankfurter.

[http://www.wirsindsmyk.de/print/end-of-the-weak/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010040/http:/www.wirsindsmyk.de/print/end-of-the-weak/ "http://www.wirsindsmyk.de/print/end-of-the-weak/")

and this one is a bit different

[http://www.designproject.co.uk/work/client08/work5/work.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010040/http:/www.designproject.co.uk/work/client08/work5/work.jpg "http://www.designproject.co.uk/work/client08/work5/work.jpg")

Dou you know whats them name ? thanx
